website_summaries.verdict: Offers an economical and high-quality sit-inside kayak.
pros: High-density polyethylene construction ensures the kayak will maintain its appearance for years to come
cons: Can be tough for tall kayakers to get in and out of the kayak

customer_reviews.title: Great boat!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for a beginner or even an adult. We have two and are looking forward to lots of use this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Hashbean

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Lovely little kayak. Neatly made. Only missing a thing that would make it lockable. Easy to use, to carry.
customer_reviews.author: R. N. Shore

customer_reviews.title: I love my new kayak
customer_reviews.text: I love my new kayak! It arrived in great shape in 3 days. Works great on my lake and is very comfortable. Might have to get another one for my husband!
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Very easy to navigate
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very easy to navigate. Never felt like it would tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price. It just took a long time for delivery (almost a month). I ordered another color and a set of oars. The order for the Kayak was cancelled so I ordered this one. Well this one came with oars. I could have saved a few $$$
customer_reviews.author: ColdWarVet75

customer_reviews.title: We love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love these things stable on even choppy water (Lake Erie), not too heavy (42 LBS), Works great, you do need a good paddle to go with it tho. I'm kinda glad my wife picked orange too, it's EZ to see (By the Motorized Boats that can run you over). Good buoyancy, with me sitting in one of these (5'7" & 215 LBs), it's comfortable and can be in about 2, 3 feet of water and not bottomed out. it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt. Lins

customer_reviews.title: ‘‘Tis is a great canoe, I just found one at tractor supply ...
customer_reviews.text: ‘‘Tis is a great canoe, I just found one at tractor supply for the same price with a paddle included.
customer_reviews.author: Tag Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Shipping as fast and easy too!
customer_reviews.text: Get it for my mom, she loves it. Can't wait to go out on the water with her. Shipping as fast and easy too!
customer_reviews.author: The Bunk

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Walmart has the same model for $180, with a paddle. $70 cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Troutman

customer_reviews.title: This is a decent little kayak at a nice price point
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent little kayak at a nice price point. My one complaint is that it arrived with a bunch of orange plastic shavings within they kayak. As a consequence, we are always leaving a few plastic shavings with every use, no matter how we try to get them all out!
customer_reviews.author: Professor

customer_reviews.title: Great Recreational Kayak for Weekend Kayakers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rigid kayak to replace an inflatable one that I used last season. I was a little worried about getting it onto the top of my car, but after a couple of practice attempts it wasn't too difficult. It is super stable (we kayak the TN river) in windy and choppy conditions. It seems to track well and for a recreational kayak it hits all the marks. The seat is is comfortable and at 5'9" I found the leg room to be fine. I'm more likely to try more kayaking spots now with this rigid kayak and I believe that this one will last me for several seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Kayak is a dream, but production materials are unknown
customer_reviews.text: Love the kayak and it is a dream to utilize. Weird about the California law that the product is made with potential materials that may cause cancer or harm pregnant women, but no one at the company seems to know what this one or more (potential for 200 products) actually is. Disturbing to be out there getting fit and healthy in a boat that may give you cancer???
customer_reviews.author: Manon de la Cure

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good beginner kayak aslong as you buy elsewhere. I just bought this same model for $179.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Not strong
customer_reviews.text: Not very strong. Hit some rocks and hull got dented in on bottom now it rides very low in the back making it easy to swamp.
customer_reviews.author: sobstory

customer_reviews.title: leaks
customer_reviews.text: loved it till i got in the water and noticed its leaking from where the peddles are mounted to the side wall. unfortunately i have modded it (installed rod and paddle holders) so manufacturer and reseller (walmart) wont take a return
customer_reviews.author: Owen G.

product_meta.title: SUNDOLPHIN Sun Dolphin Aruba 10-Foot Sit-in Kayak
product_meta.description:
The Sun Dolphin Aruba 10' Sit In Kayak, is a great kayak for any water enthusiast. This kayak is crafted of a rugged UV-stabilized Fortiflex High Density Polyethylene hull and features a deluxe adjustable seat with high back support and adjustable foot braces. There are carrying handles for easier portage and a convenient storage hatch and water bottle holder..


***Important information when placing your order***


Please verify address and telephone# are accurate. The carriers will contact the phone number on the order to set up a delivery appointment. If this information is inaccurate, there is a possibility that your order will be delayed or cancelled with a possible fee incurred at the sellers discretion.
feature_bullets: Large open cockpit with adjustable padded seat with high back support
Convenient gear storage with shock cord deck rigging
Rugged UV-stabilized Fortiflex High Density Polyethylene
***IMPORTANT – phone number is needed to schedule a delivery appointment***
